channel.title: Sunset on Brayden's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Sunset on Brayden's Recipes

item.title: La Taqueria Carnitas
item.description: Source: Sunset Ingredients 1 boned, tied pork shoulder or butt (4 to 5 lb.) 2 onions (1 lb. total), peeled and quartered 4 stalks celery (including leaves), rinsed and cut into chunks 4 cloves garlic, peeled 2 dried bay leaves 2 teaspoons dried thyme About 1 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup milk Directions Rinse pork and put in a 6- to 8-quart pan. Add onions, celery, garlic, bay leaves, thyme, 1 teaspoon salt, and enough water to cover meat–2 1/2 to 3 1/2 quarts.
